name: Deep Lawn
description: AI-based lawn measurements and sales tool with over 600 registered companies
paragraphs: AI-based lawn measurements and sales tool serving over 600 registered companies.
Developed modules for branding, widget integration, aerial HD imagery, and Stripe subscriptions.
Integrated Real Green API, Clover Card, and implemented Selenium automation for testing.

name: Market Makers
description: AI-driven research tool with real-time financial information and trading game
paragraphs: AI-driven research tool providing real-time financial information and algorithmic investment insights.
Developed the Historic Calendar module for tracking financial data and trading patterns.
Implemented features to help users stay ahead in the global markets with advanced analytics.

name: Service Cart
description: AI-based property measurements and instant quotes for cleaning companies
paragraphs: Sister project of Deep Lawn focusing on AI-based property measurements for cleaning companies.
Implemented Paddle payment processing, Card Connect API integration, and custom flows for contractors.
Led product initial release and coordinated data migration efforts for seamless operation.

name: Dogwood Analytics
description: Tailored hybrid software program that performs as a business intelligence tool
paragraphs: A tailored hybrid software solution that serves as a comprehensive business intelligence tool.
Developed the initial structure, admin dashboard, employee portal, and CSR dashboards with sales analytics.
Implemented settings module and handled staging deployment for efficient testing and iteration.

name: KGHYPE - Taobao Agent
description: Shipping and logistics platform for Taobao purchases
paragraphs: Comprehensive shipping and logistics platform serving as a Taobao agent for international customers.
Developed affiliate marketing page to increase user engagement and conversion rates.
Created advanced shipping calculation algorithm and implemented robust search functionality.

name: Ready To Munch
description: Online food ordering platform for a Pakistan-based company
paragraphs: Online food ordering platform developed for a Pakistan-based food delivery company.
Designed and implemented responsive website UI for optimal user experience across devices.
Created dynamic blog pages to improve SEO and user engagement with the platform.

name: Sachin Jha Blog
description: Blog website for an India-based cloud solutions expert
paragraphs: Blog website developed for an India-based cloud solutions expert to share technical knowledge.
Integrated Netlify CMS for easy content management and publishing workflow.
Implemented dynamic blogs with Gatsby's server-side rendering for improved performance and SEO.

name: David Secul Portfolio
description: Portfolio website for a US-based entrepreneur
paragraphs: Professional portfolio website for a US-based entrepreneur to showcase services and projects.
Designed and implemented responsive UI focusing on professional presentation and brand identity.
Created form-based website update mechanism for easy content management without technical expertise.

name: Xsisec Portfolio
description: Portfolio website for a Denmark-based senior software tester
paragraphs: Professional portfolio website for a Denmark-based senior software tester to showcase expertise.
Developed UI with focus on professional presentation of testing services and portfolio projects.
Implemented form-based website update mechanism for easy content management by the client.

name: Vast Studio
description: Architecture-first intelligent code editor with AI integration
paragraphs: Modern intelligent code editor that understands project requirements and automates code generation.
Built with architecture-first approach enabling users to configure API routes and database entities visually.
Integrated AI engine for intelligent suggestions and built-in best practices with real-time diagnostic feedback.

name: TripTalk
description: Travel social platform for sharing experiences and recommendations
paragraphs: Interactive social platform for travelers to share experiences, itineraries and destination recommendations.
Implemented location-based searching with Google Maps integration and user-generated content features.
Created responsive UI optimized for both mobile and desktop with real-time notifications and messaging.

name: ILM UK
description: Educational resource platform for UK-based Islamic organization
paragraphs: Resource platform for UK-based Islamic educational organization providing learning materials and community resources.
Designed responsive interface with accessibility features to ensure content availability for all users.
Integrated content management system allowing administrators to easily update educational materials.

name: Premier Vet Alliance
description: Comprehensive platform for veterinary services and pet care management
paragraphs: Comprehensive platform for veterinary service providers with integrated financial and pet owner management tools.
Created separate interfaces for pet owners and veterinary professionals with role-based access controls.
Implemented secure payment processing and financial management features compliant with FCA regulations.

name: Manage Nail Shops
description: Modern management application for nail salon businesses
paragraphs: Streamlined management application for nail salon owners featuring detailed reporting and advanced analytics.
Developed customer-centric features including effortless check-in, swift check-out, and appointment scheduling.
Created owner dashboard with business insights, performance metrics, and operational efficiency tools.

name: Podly
description: Podcast streaming and management platform with creator tools
paragraphs: Innovative podcast platform with streaming capabilities and advanced tools for content creators.
Implemented cloud-based audio processing using AWS and voice enhancement technologies.
Created audience analytics dashboard and monetization features for podcast creators.

name: Portuguese Grammar App
description: Interactive language learning tool for Portuguese grammar practice
paragraphs: Educational application providing interactive exercises and lessons for Portuguese language learners.
Developed spaced repetition system for vocabulary and grammar practice with progress tracking.
Implemented audio pronunciation features and personalized learning paths based on user performance.
